segments.text: Hello . Good morning , Stately Restaurant . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to book a table for seven thirty o'clock , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine , sir . For how many people , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For four people . We'd like a quiet table with a fine view of the river .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Peter Kaufman , P-E-T-E-R ( Peter ) , K-A-U-F-M-A-N ( Kaufman ) .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , thanks , Mr . Kaufman . We look forward to your visit .
segments.speaker: S1
